modName: Necromancer Robe and Novice Hood Black - Punisher style
summary: Just the necro robe + nivice hood in black with punisher skull.
descriptionHtml:
I just changed the colour of the hood and robe and added the punisher skull instead of the normal green skull on the necro robe.

Just did it to try out the Mod guide which is really helpful and I wanted to try it out. :)

Unpack the files into:
Skyrim\\Data\\Textures

The Path is given in the zipped folders.
Hope you enjoy it.
author: RavenCane
